data.fullContent: Nationwide passenger services are provided by the federal crown corporation Via Rail. Three Canadian cities have commuter rail services: in the Montreal area by AMT, in the Toronto area by GO Transit, and in the Vancouver area by West Coast Express. Smaller railways such as Ontario Northland, Rocky Mountaineer, and Algoma Central also run passenger trains to remote rural areas.
data.answer: 联邦皇冠公司通过铁路提供全国客运服务。加拿大有三个城市有通勤铁路服务:在蒙特利尔地区乘坐AMT，在多伦多地区乘坐GO Transit，在温哥华地区乘坐西海岸特快。较小的铁路公司，如安大略北国铁路、洛基山民铁路和阿尔戈马中心铁路也有开往偏远农村地区的客运列车。
